metadata.Title: CVE-2017-5206 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Firejail before 0.9.44.4, when running on a Linux kernel before 4.8, allows context-dependent attackers to bypass a seccomp-based sandbox protection mechanism via the --allow-debuggers argument.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2017-5206` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

firejail - 0.9.44.8-1
firejail-profiles - 0.9.44.8-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firejail package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.9.44.8-1').
